roleset.name: make into tangles
roleset.note: ENSNARL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ensnarl' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from ensnarl.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [Legislation to lift the debt ceiling]-1 is ensnarled *trace*-1 in the fight over cutting capital-gains taxes.
example.arg: in the fight over cutting capital-gains taxes

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Now that they had him back in Kansas they ensnarled him in expensive lawsuits.
example.arg: Now that they had him back in Kansas
